description: Script that creates a Grok project directory, installs Grok, the Grok Toolkit and the ope Toolkit and sets up a complete skeleton for a new Grok web application.

info.Package Index Owner:: philikon, faassen, jw, d2m, ulif, trollfot, kevingill, cklinger, janjaapdriessen, vincentfretin

longdescription: Script that creates a Grok project directory, installs Grok, the Grok Toolkit and the ope Toolkit and sets up a complete skeleton for a new Grok web application.
